attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Income could be virtually capitalised at nominal central bank interest rates to allow calculation with an inverse function as used to show the return on investment of some capitalization. This could be unified with any other capital assets of individuals to yield a taxable sum.
That is to say income is treated as the return on lifetime skill investment, that being the calculated capital granting income, which may be taxed along with other capital assets possessed by competent individuals, however they may be organized.
